sitedescription: This is the Portfolio Website of Rutvik Solanki. He is a Mechanical Engineering Student interested and working on Fluid Dynamics. Available on Contract-based jobs for Mechanical Engineering Design Jobs. Also a part-time web-app Developer, a novice penetration tester and a budding flutter developer. I can definitely solve your mechanical Engineering problems, it's also possible that I might be ale to help you create awesome web-apps(expert at Django-based web-apps). Contact me for any kind of Collaborative projects.
